Research

Home

I am an Associate Professor and the Chair of the Department of Mathematics and Physics at the University of Wisconsin - Parkside. Currently, I am teaching Math 221 (Calculus and Analytic Geometry I) and Math 350 (Advanced Calculus). My research interests are algebraic geometry, representation theory, and combinatorics.

kreiman@uwp.edu
